name: European Association of Data Protection Professionals
goal:
The primary aim of the EADPP is to facilitate, organise, structure, and represent European data protection professionals based on European perspectives and the principles of the GDPR.

In this light, our two first initiatives will be to create an EADPP certificate for data protection professionals and to secure proper representation at all relevant levels of the European Union.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
General Data Protection Regulation in general
E-Privacy Regulation
EDPB guidlines & Opinions
EDPS Public papers
ENISA certifications
